question: 自由
sourceMnemonic: When you have <kanji>self</kanji> <kanji>reason</kanji>, you are able to think for yourself. When you can think for yourself, you have <vocabulary>freedom</vocabulary>. Very philosophical, this vocab is.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
